alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Otero and west central Bent Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North La Junta, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Higbee and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
